quote: Open source AI is democratizing access to powerful models. We're witnessing a fundamental shift in how AI development happens - from closed labs to global collaboration.
author: sama

quote: The path to AGI will be paved by open-source contributions. No single company can solve this alone.
author: ylecun

quote: We're not at AGI yet, but the rate of progress is extraordinary. Models are becoming more capable every month.
author: karpathy

quote: Open source AI frameworks are the future. Community-driven innovation is outpacing corporate development in many areas.
author: hardmaru

quote: The combination of powerful open-source models and agentic workflows is game-changing for developers.
author: emollick

quote: AGI isn't just about raw intelligence - it's about systems that can truly understand and adapt. We're getting closer.
author: DrJimFan

quote: Open-source AI is democratizing innovation. Anyone with an idea can now build sophisticated AI applications.
author: svpino

quote: The future of AI is open. Closed models will struggle to compete with the pace of community innovation.
author: jeremyphoward

quote: Personal AI assistants running on your own infrastructure - that's the vision of truly personal AI. No data sharing, full control.
author: levelsio

quote: The open-source AI community is building tools that empower individuals, not just enterprises.
author: weights_biases

quote: We need AGI to be developed in the open. The stakes are too high for this to happen behind closed doors.
author: GaryMarcus

quote: Open source AI agents are bridging the gap between research and real-world applications.
author: andrew_n_carr

quote: The most exciting AI developments are happening in open source. Transparency breeds innovation.
author: minimaxir

quote: AI that works for you, not for advertisers. That's the promise of self-hosted, open-source solutions.
author: dhh

quote: The real productivity gains from AI come when it's integrated into your personal workflows, not just accessed through a web interface.
author: benedictevans

quote: Open-source AI frameworks are leveling the playing field. Small teams can now build what used to require huge research labs.
author: abacaj

quote: The future belongs to AI systems that remember context, learn from interactions, and proactively help - all while respecting privacy.
author: simonw

quote: Open source is the only way to build trustworthy AI. Transparency and community oversight are essential.
author: fchollet

quote: Personal AI assistants should be personal - running on your hardware, trained on your data, working for YOU.
author: balajis

quote: The convergence of open-source AI, agentic systems, and personal compute is creating entirely new possibilities.
author: karpathy
